net.trajano.ms.engine

Class ManifestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.ms.engine.ManifestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.ext.web.RoutingContext>, AutoCloseable

    public class ManifestHandler
extends Object
implements io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.ext.web.RoutingContext>, AutoCloseable
    This creates a route that will provide data from the MANIFIEST.MF of the application which can contain information such as version and build number.
    Author:
    Archimedes Trajano
